email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for reaching out. For this shipment, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.50 per MT. The vessel we have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, a VLCC with a DWT of 300,000 and LOA of 330 meters. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for the quick response. My client is considering your offer but is hoping for a rate closer to $49.75 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I understand your client's position. We can adjust the rate to $50.00 per MT, but that's our best offer. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for the revised offer. My client has agreed to the rate of $50.00 per MT and the laytime/demurrage terms. Please proceed with the fixture for MV Ocean Star. I'll send over the recap shortly. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Great news! We'll proceed with the fixture. Please send the recap at your earliest convenience. Looking forward to working together on this. Cheers, John
